page.title: 01WILLOUGHBY-ON THE WOLDS
page.content: Our block is a farming area situated on the Nottinghamshire/Leicestershire border.The land is fairly flat and the pasture is good although it is a clay soil,which makes gardening hard work! A lot of people round here own and ride horses.The only village within the block is {Willoughby-on-the-Wolds,}with a population of around 500.There is little employment in the area except on farms,so most people commute to Loughborough,Leicester or Nottingham to work.However Willoughby does have its own school,church,chapel,pub,Post Office cum village store,and a pie shop.Unfortunately,the village bakery recently closed down.There is a strong community spirit within the area with keen support for any activities which are organized.
